Game.Name: Lord Monarch - Tokoton Sentou Densetsu (Japan)
Game.plot: Lord Monarch: Tokoton Sentou Densetsu is a Strategy game, developed by Omiya Soft and published by Sega,which was released in Japan in 1994.
Game.Notes: Lord Monarch is a 1991 strategy game for the NEC PC-98 by Falcom and the seventh main title in their Dragon Slayer series. Sega Falcom remade it for the Sega Mega Drive in 1994, this time called Lord Monarch: Tokoton Sentou Densetsu (ロードモナーク・とことん戦闘伝説). This version was not released outside Japan.
